channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. hit Venezuela with 'large-scale strike,' captured Nicolás Maduro, Trump says
item.description: President Trump claimed overnight that the United States carried out airstrikes in Venezuela and captured President Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Diane Crump, First Woman to Ride in Kentucky Derby, Dies at 77
item.description: She was the first professional female jockey to compete at a track in the United States where betting was legal, and notched up 228 career victories.
